data.actual_result: it crops the image into a rectangle and leaves open space on the sides of the image when you hit accept after cropping.
data.expected_result: Image crops and fills the profile picture circle
data.short_description: Cropping images for pfp leaves the image cropped into a rectangle as opposed to a circle.
data.steps_to_repro: - crop an image for you pfp with the in app image cropper (probably 583 specific) - hit accept and then look at the image and notice it's been cropped into a rectangle and doesn't fit the pfp circle.
